    Install MAXENT

    InstallMAXENT.Rmd

    Obtain and Install MAXENT

    To obtain MAXENT go to:

    http://rob.schapire.net/

    Click on MAXENT software and datasets.

    Register and download the default current version (3.4.1, as of 21 May 2019) into your default (or wherever) downloads directory. Unzip the file. Once unzipped you will see four files:

    • maxent.bat,

    • maxent.jar,

    • maxent.sh, and

    • readme.txt

    Install Package dismo

    Next, install package dismo and dependencies in R, if you have not already done so. dismo is the R interface for MAXENT (as well as other SDM tools).

    # install dismo if not installed using scripts in Install Packages
install.packages("dismo", dependencies = T)

    dismo will (if you have a standard configuration) be in your active win–library, and will have a directory called java.

    Copy and paste, or move, the maxent.jar, maxent.bat, maxent.sh, and readme.txt files into the java directory.

    MAXENT can now accessed from any R session once package dismo is loaded. We will see how to access MAXENT during the class.

    Problems?

    Start by reading the readme.txt. Most problems can be solved from there.

    You’re done.
